TopicTitle: BUG: SFS broken - Kills Resume option

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.02 Windows 32-bit Game / Windows 7 64 Bit

What Happened: Complete loss of resume function.

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Result: Resume button loses functionality.

Fixes/workarounds:

- Removed/deleted saved Games (see below)

Recently the game crashed on me after I landed a craft. When I reloaded the game and attempted to Resume a saved game. NOTHING would come up - it was as if the "Resume" had died completely (clicking resume did NOT bring up the normal load window). I started a new game - saved it - quit the game and came back. Resume button still no longer functioned. I completely uninstalled the game. Reinstalled and resume was still not working. 

I went into the folders and moved the entire "Kerbal Space Program" folder to a new location. Reinstalled from Steam again (no longer having any save games in the rebuilt folder) and the resume started working again.

I moved my saved folder back into the Game folder and it broke the "Resume" again. After a bit of fiddling around, I renamed persistent.sfs to quicksave.sfs and visa versa.

Suddenly my RESUME GAME started working again and also allowed me to go back into my saved game. Maybe a couple hours behind - but still.

I'm putting this up on the board cause this Broke the game completly.

I still have a copy of the SFS files. I hope someone see's this and fixes it. if it was the "Persistant.sfs" file that was broke. maybe an option that works around it to get to the other saved games?

Thanks in advance.

Axehandler
